notes: The attack range bonus only affects ranged attacks. Melee attacks only apply the bonus damage.

The bonus damage is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus and is magical damage. Although the attack damage bonus values are not displayed in the HUD, it is still considered and directly added to the unit's attack damage. It is not considered by lifesteal, crit or cleave. It can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. magical damage barrier). Since it is considered bonus attack damage, it is not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions.
Although the attack damage bonus values are not displayed in the HUD, it is still considered and directly added to the unit's attack damage.
It is not considered by lifesteal, crit or cleave.
It can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. magical damage barrier).
Since it is considered bonus attack damage, it is not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions.
Certain Strike triggers against any attack target, but the damage and True Strike are not applied if the target is a building.
abilities.description: Empowers your next attack with 225 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +350 bonus range for the attack.

name: Enchanted Quiver
description: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.
